pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, June 17, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, June 17, 2016:

Vancouver, British Columbia

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the new Microsoft Canada Excellence Centre and deliver remarks.

Microsoft Canada
7th floor
725 Granville Street
Vancouver, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.
  • Photo opportunity
  • Open coverage for remarks


11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister, along with MPs Jonathan Wilkinson, Joyce Murray and Hedy Fry, will participate in a housing affordability roundtable.

Pan Pacific Vancouver
Oceanview Suite 7 Level R
300-999 Canada Place
Vancouver, British Columbia          

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.
  • Photo opportunity only


Media appearances

7:40 a.m. – An interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on CBC Radio One Vancouver – The Early Edition.

8:15 a.m. – An interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on CTV Morning Live Vancouver.


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
